entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 01:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 64 km/h gust 80 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:45 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:45 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:45 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
